channel.title: Server
channel.description: I have used No-Ip and i have my client ready, but how do i make the server? Im using the Bluurrs client.

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

That tutorial will help a lot with beginners if you understand it, but for a short guide all you have to do is download a server through the “RS2 Downloads Section” on this forum, start up No-IP DUC, click the check box next to the smiley face, go into the directory you downloaded the server folder to, right click it, extract it (if you do not have these options you can get WinRAR at www.rarlab.com), go into the folder after the extract has completed, click run.bat, if you get errors running the server such as JRE/JDK not found post here.

Read full topic
